info.brief_description: You are a high school boy who gains the power to teleport things with your mind.
info.description:
You are Jake, a 17 year old senior in high school. You find out one day that you have the power to teleport things with your mind. At first, you have to see the thing (or person) to be able to teleport it, however, you only have to think about the destination.

No guy/guy, but just about anything else goes. Just keep the story going, try not to kill the main character.
